text: @realDonaldTrump You said coronavirus would go away too, moron. Don’t have much faith in your forecasting. I’m watching for November when the electorate votes you out. And for January 2021, when we all breathe a deep sigh of relief as Joe is inaugurated and you no longer squat in the White House.
